fulltext:
RESUME 
Than Trong Duy 
Birthday: 04 May 1985 
PROFILE: 
A perfectionist in work, I always want my work to get the best result. I also find 
the effort ways to self-improve own skill as well as work quality.  
Always work with strong motivation and passion at work. 
Great sense of responsibility and strong commitment. Do not give up when 
facing difficulty or always try to fulfill duties by different ways 
Be always evaluated high level from the first days in Gameloft and Global 
Cybersoft Vietnam 
Love and always be willing to take the challengers. 
Open-minded and possess solution-oriented mindset. 
Have deep knowledge about game testing process and software testing process. 
Have good command of tools. 
Be able to make and follow-up plan. 
Always learn from mistakes to prevent them from happening again. 
Be willing to share information, experience and knowledge. 
Possess good logical and systematically thinking. 
Expertise includes: 
Team building 
Linux operating systems 
Interviewing 
Small-scale project management 
Mid-scale team management 
Game testing 
Software testing 
Sound technical and testing 
Software Development processes 
Teams' discipline and working attitude 
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE: 
March 2018 - 2019: work at Best food for you Ltd Company 
⚫ 
May 2018: Act as General Manager and Director Assistant 
Task: 
Arrange working hours for employees 
Assign and coordinate task for employees  
Manage and instruct staff how to best serve customers 
Train employees properly 
Solve problems between customers and employees 
Support in case the employee is absent 
Responsible for money issues or papers 
Interview, recruitment and staff training 
Check out the kitchen area and restaurant area 
Ensure hygiene standards 
October 2016 - October 2017: work at Neolab Vietnam 
⚫ 
November 2016: Build standard testing process for company. 
⚫ 
December 2016: Create hiring test and join interview team for testing 
recruitment 
⚫ 
December 2016: Become QC manager candidate 
⚫ 
December 2016: Join “kaizen” team to help improve process in company. 
Task: 
Execute test cases 
Perform Ad-hoc test 
Create, follow and verify bug 
Help Scrum master manage bug and task 
Make report 
September 2014 - September 2016: work at Global Cybersoft Vietnam 
⚫ 
September 2014: Work as engineer for the most important project. 
⚫ 
January 2015: Join Leader training at Sai Gon Branch. 
⚫ 
February 2015: Work as team leader at Da Nang Branch. 
Task: 
Verify bugs on JIRA for myself and the others. 
Execute and report special tasks such as NEL, DBSTalks, CB/DB, Special 
build, etc. 
Find and post bug. 
Execute test cases. 
Suggestion, improvements, updates to test cases on Testlink. 
JIRA processing: Filter/Prioritize/Assign bugs, Track and review comments, 
process; Support solving JIRA issues, Watch JIRAs to update the current 
progress and feature update to figure out the strategy, then update to team. 
Analyze Jira to propose TC modification. 
Update estimation to database. 
Assign tasks to members. 
Download/Upload build. 
Solve issues with Sling, network, devices and environment settings. 
Compose slides for training, presentation. 
Create/Update testsuite, manage TCs in a testsuite. 
Track testing progress. 
Sync test assignment, test result. 
Update latest document/spec/feature/UI/etc. 
Review bug contents or template. 
Technical support for test execution. 
Doing report for team/task. 
Collect team data, team ideas and issues, then process it or propose to 
higher level. 
Track devices moving in teams. 
Role: 
Job Knowledge - Understanding of domain knowledge, skills, equipment, and 
resources required to perform work assignments. 
Responsibility - Demonstrate ownership of assigned work; accept 
responsibility for their performance; accept new assignment; fulfill 
commitments, meet deadlines and achieves expected results; provide fair 
and timely feedback on member's performance; positive work attitude 
Initiative - Have ability in analyzing problems, generating ideas & taking 
action to solve problems; make appropriate decisions; suggest & implement 
improved work methods; follow through on tasks with little or no reminders; 
willingness to learn new skills; receptive to new ideas and new questions; 
encourage innovation and initiative; create a vision and strategy for 
members. 
Teamwork - Have ability in cooperating with other members in a team 
effectively to achieve the common goals/targets; provide an efficient work 
atmosphere; willing to help and guide members when needed 
Development  - Have ability to recognize strong points, weaknesses and 
create a plan for self-improvement; acknowledge own limitations and 
mistakes. 
Leadership/Management skill - Have professional, administrative, and 
specialized knowledge required to perform the job; ability to motivate others, 
to foster employee morale and satisfaction; providing clear instruction, 
communicating constructive feedback, recognizing and resolving problem; 
provides opportunities for others to develop skills; influence other members; 
inspire trust and respect from others. 
Negotiation skill – Effectively resolving issues through such things as the 
understanding of key motivators, negotiating around fixed positions and 
practicing win-win negotiations. 
Communication skill - Have ability to communicate clearly; effective written 
and verbal communication skills; openly and honestly with members. 
Staff Development - Have ability to recognizing employee’s abilities and 
skills, giving clear instructions and guidance in order to improve weaknesses; 
promotes employee safety and wellness; rewards and recognizes individual 
and team successes; motivate members to perform well and good working 
relationships. 
September 2010 - August 2014: work at Gameloft 
⚫ 
September 2010: One of two the best passed the initial training course in 
DAD studio. 
⚫ 
October 2010: Newbie in TNS team, the most important team at that time. 
⚫ 
November 2010 - March 2011: Main key in LatAm team. 
⚫ 
March 2011 - July 2013: Senior in DAD Sound team. My duty is finish my 
work, support and share tasks with my leader as well as back up for him. 
⚫ 
August 2013 - August 2014: Leader of SA2 Sound team. But I act as QA 
Project Manager and Sound Division Lead , I always handle 7-8 projects at 
the same time, around 40 projects per year and make sure that all projects 
both meet the deadline , achieve objectives and milestones. I also often 
make decisions concerning all sound issues in Gameloft SA2 studio. I become 
the prime candidate for SEA Sound QA Lead position. 
Role: 
Analyze all requests, documents and objectives set for project and give right 
instructions to the teams. 
Analyze the project status to implement appropriate solution and strategy. 
Deploy testing plan among team-members. 
Provide guidance so that the team executes the tasks diligently. 
Ensure that the team effectively achieves milestones as planned, quality 
targets, and meet the deadlines. 
Ensure that the team performs tests according to checklists and process. 
Ensure that the team is disciplined, motivated and committed. 
Manage time, pressure and work flow in best way, so that situation of 
overloading or disorganization is prevented. 
Set clear responsibilities for each team-member and ensure that testers are 
assigned the right tasks which are suitable with their experience and skills. 
Plan the tests effectively with precise time estimation. 
Control project status, so that issues are fixed or anticipated, and necessary 
feedback are raised to superiors in timely manner. 
Carry out project post-mortem analysis/meeting to guide team-members and 
to learn lessons from the past issues. 
Find the way to motivate team-members, inspiring them enthusiasm at 
work, willingness to learn and improve, dedication, positive thinking as well 
problem-solving mindset. 
Create hiring test and interview candidates for team and division. 
Train newbie for team and division. 
Coach testers to constitute a strong and highly skilled core resource, which 
effectively helps team management and improvement. 
Have plan to improve testers in general in both skills and professional 
working style and method. 
Set necessary rules to improve the teams' discipline and working attitude. 
EDUCATION/ QUALIFICATIONS/ ARCHIEVEMENTS: 
2006: Graduate in NIIT course at Phu Xuan University. 
2010: Graduate in Information Systems at Yersin University. 
2010: make 365 TOEIC points. 
2011: rank 13th at annual QA challenge. 
2013: rank 1st in all Vietnam studios at the contest to recruit QA lead for SA2 
sound team. 
2014: rank 1st at the sound skill contest. 
And many awards in other activities in Gameloft. 
2014: become one of two candidates for team leader after 3 working months. 
2015: join Leader training at Saigon. 
2017: get 550 TOEIC points 
REFERENCE: 
Than Trong Phuc 
Managing Director of DFJ VinaCapital fund 
Email: phuc.than@vinacapital.com

educations.major: Hệ thống thông tin quản lý
